name: Salmon Run (itch)
description:
Get one with nature and become the bear, hunting for salmon along a river. Catch salmon at different speeds, reach a high score, and avoid the poisoned fish! With three levels of difficulty, you can practice the ultimate bear life in Salmon Run.

My personal project for the Junior Programming course on the Unity Learn website. Basic controls:

  • left and right arrow key for horizontal movement
  • space bar to pause
  • sliders for music and FX volume control

Enjoy! Lemme know what you think!
